title: Manage Pharmacy Inventory
description: A pharmacy technician notices that the stock of a common antibiotic is low and needs to order more.

tasks.description: Check the current on-hand quantity of the antibiotic in the pharmacy system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician confirms the stock is below the designated par level.

tasks.description: Generate a purchase order for the medication from the primary wholesaler.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system creates a purchase order for the standard reorder quantity.

tasks.description: Transmit the purchase order to the wholesaler.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is successfully sent, and an electronic confirmation is received.
